name: Light Bringer (itch) (Bahadir1)
description:
This game was made in 1 month for GameOff2022.

Please review the 'How To Play' section to fully understand the game

You are a Light Bringer. Far, far away, there is a dark world where evil reigns. You have one purpose. As its very name signifies, to bring light.

---Controls---

W , A , S , D  --> Movement

Left Click  --> Shoot

E  --> Interact
